title: Multimodal Middle Ages History Exploration Project

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic political and economic structures of medieval Europe and historical events
context.additional_context: Emphasizing collaboration and creative expression using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners produce a digital timeline analytically explaining major medieval historical events
Visually represent historical contexts using diverse media (text, images, audio)
Compare and evaluate similarities/differences between medieval and modern social structures through project deliverables
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
